sentences.en: As a general rule, all muscular effort is enhanced by breathing in as the effort is made.
sentences.cn: 通常，肌肉的力量能通过使劲儿吸气增强。

sentences.en: Beautiful coloured illustrations enhanced the book.
sentences.cn: 漂亮的彩色插图使这本书更具吸引力.

sentences.en: Certain modes of vibration may be suppressed while others may be enhanced.
sentences.cn: 某些振型可能减弱,而另一些则可能加强.

sentences.en: Enhanced grid control with customizable column attribute and dropdown comboboxes.
sentences.cn: 具有可定制行列属性和下拉式组合框的增强的网格控制.

sentences.en: Fig . 8 . 29 shows the effect on the solution of including elasticity and enhanced viscosity.
sentences.cn: 图8.29表示考虑弹性变形及粘度提高对计算结果的影响.

sentences.en: His consistent critical position has only enhanced the unity of his treatment.
sentences.cn: 他一贯批判的立场只不过加强了他论述的一致性.

sentences.en: Peak updraft strength is slightly enhanced with hodograph curvature.
sentences.cn: 山顶上升气流强度随速矢端迹曲率加大而稍有加强.

sentences.en: Such a striking contrast has enhanced the attractiveness of both.
sentences.cn: 两者刚柔相济,美不胜收.

sentences.en: The black wimple enhanced the whiteness of her skin.
sentences.cn: 黑色的包头巾使她的皮肤显得更加白皙.

sentences.en: The intimacy of the room was enhanced by its warm colours.
sentences.cn: 房间温暖的色泽更增加它的舒适感.

sentences.en: The light in the car was dim , and that too , enhanced the threatening atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 而且,车里的灯很暗, 有一种我很陌生的杀气腾腾之感.

sentences.en: The memory factor enhanced was regarded by medical experts as the most important.
sentences.cn: 医学专家们以为,提高记忆力的作用是最为重要的.

sentences.en: The moonlight enhanced the beauty of the scene.
sentences.cn: 月光使这景色更加美丽.

sentences.en: The superb sets are enhanced by Bobby Crossman's marvellous costumes.
sentences.cn: 博比·克罗斯曼绝妙的服装为华丽的舞台增色不少。

sentences.en: The White House is eager to protect and enhance that reputation.
sentences.cn: 白宫急于保护并提高那声望。

sentences.en: While operating charge increase, and the production cost enhanced also.
sentences.cn: 同时作业费用增加, 使得采油成本加大.

words.tran_cn: [遗] 增强子；强化剂；增加者

phrases.tran_cn: 【电脑】一种经过加密的电子邮件

trans.tran_cn: 提高( enhance的过去式和过去分词 )，增进，用计算机增强（照片等），提高…的价值（或价格）
trans.tran_en: To enhance something means to improve its value, quality, or attractiveness
